name: pointless-js
description: Functional, tree-shakeable point-free utilities for js

scripts.build: npm run checks && npm run build:js && npm run build:es && npm run build:next && npm run build:umd
scripts.commit-build: (git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet) || (git add . && git commit -m "Update dist")
scripts.preversion: npm t && npm run build && npm run commit-build
scripts.prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next && git push
scripts.pre-minor: npm version preminor --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next && git push
scripts.pre-major: npm version premajor --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next && git push
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && git push

author: Raiondesu <a.raiondesu@gmail.com>
